title: Citibank Bulgaria Named Best Foreign Bank Branch in Bulgaria
summary: Sofia - Citibank Bulgaria was named Best Foreign Bank Branch in Bulgaria for 2011 by the Bulgarian Bank of the Year Association. The Bulgarian franchise is recognized for its performance for the second consecutive year. The prestigious award was presented at a high-profile ceremony attended by many in the Bulgarian banking community, the Central Bank Governor and representatives of other regulatory bodies, government officials, business and the media.
tag-1: Citibank Bulgaria Named Best Foreign Bank Branch in Bulgaria
tag-2: Sofia – Citibank Bulgaria was named Best Foreign Bank Branch in Bulgaria for 2011 by the Bulgarian Bank of the Year Association. The Bulgarian franchise is recognized for its performance for the second consecutive year. The prestigious award was presented at a high-profile ceremony attended by many in the Bulgarian banking community, the Central Bank Governor and representatives of other regulatory bodies, government officials, business and the media.
tag-3: Accepting the award, Stefan Felstein, Citi Country Officer for Bulgaria, said, "It is a great honor for Citi Bulgaria, as we celebrate our 200th anniversary globally, to receive this award. We look forward to continuing to serve our clients with the level of service that they deserve for many years to come."
tag-4: Celebrating its 20th anniversary this year, Bank of the Year Association reiterated that it will maintain its exacting standards in recognizing leadership and top performance in the banking industry. Each year, the panel of judges that includes CEOs of large local and multinational companies, heads of key business organizations, top financiers, media and PR experts, rank all banks operating in Bulgaria on the basis of complex criteria and hard data provided by the Bulgarian National Bank.
tag-5: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
